#########
Open Hive
#########

************
Introduction
************

Clemens is working on the `Open Hive`_ open source / open hardware beehive monitoring project.
He engineered the `Open Hive Bee Scale`_ and `Open Hive Shields`_.

- Open Hive Bee Scale:

    .. figure:: https://scontent-frt3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xaf1/v/t1.0-0/p206x206/11188491_10204255677331817_1170125921095812284_n.jpg?oh=e86eff2ce77a3dfc2659cf7c29b438a2&oe=5755CAF2
